author: kachasan
title: Celery Leaves "Tsukudani" (Celery Leaves Boiled in Soy Sauce)
ingredients: as you like Celery (or turnip) leaves
to your taste Japanese instant bouillon (dashi no moto)
instructions_list: Pour oil in a frying pan, and stir-fry the celery leaves chopped in STEP1.
Once softened, add seasoning, and cook down until the juices reduce.
Sprinkle sesame seeds, and stir-fry lightly.
description: All you do is to chop and simmer the celery. This is a perfect dish when you have leftover celery leaves.
keywords: Celeri Leav Tsukudani Boil Soi Sauc All chop simmer celeri Thi a perfect dish leftov leav *Combin sugar REGULAR SOY SAUCE “sake” rice cook wine ratio 1:1:1 turnip Sugar Sake Japanes instant bouillon dashi moto Sesam seed
